name: SolarEdgeSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the boiler”
”Alexa, turn off the pool pump”
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
SolarEdge Smart Home skill allows you to control your SolarEdge smart devices Alexa voice commands.
Use your Alexa devices (such as ECHO) or the Alexa app to turn your devices on or off.
Activating your devices is now easier than ever!

*Note: this skill only works with SolarEdge smart home devices, and does not support PV monitoring capabilities *
